record.name: Hotpoint Class 7 SI7 891 SP IX Built-in Oven - Stainless Steel
record.shortdescription: Become renowned for your cooking excellence with the Hotpoint Built-In Oven (S19 891 SP IX). Fea...
record.longdescription: Become renowned for your cooking excellence with the Hotpoint Built-In Oven (S17 891 SP IX). Featuring a 73L capacity, A+ energy rating, easy cleaning solutions and innovative technology to ensure even heat for all-round cooking. With multiflow Technology, a new style of convection system creates an all-enveloping heat flow which pushes heat into every inch of the oven cavity for consistently even, delicious dishes every time – whichever shelf you’re using. Including a Turnspit – a handy accessory that lets you spit-roast your favourite meats for a slow-cooked, juicy experience. And the ease in cooking doesn’t stop there . . . Incorporating Telescopic Shelving to take the burden of heavy dishes, have both hands free to lift them in and out of the oven with a lower risk of mishaps and spillages. The quadruple glazed, Soft Close door also ensures gentle contact on closing to prevent unnecessary heat loss and temperature fluctuations. Removing the need to clean your oven ever again, this model comes with Pyrolytic Cleaning. Heating the cavity up to 500°C, the door automatically locks whilst any fat, grease and food residue is burnt to a small pile of ash, ready to be wiped away. Costing just a few pence per cycle, it’s easy-cleaning which removes the need for chemicals. We’ve even applied an Anti-Fingerprint coating to the oven’s exterior to give a resistant finish so the surface is always gleaming and bright. Operated via the easy-to-use Touch Control panel, the Hotpoint Built-In Oven makes light work of even the most challenging dishes whilst freeing your time for more moments with the family.
record.metaname: Built in Oven Hotpoint SI7 891 SP IX
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Built in Oven SI7 891 SP IX : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

record.name: Hotpoint Class 9 SI9 891 SC IX Electric Single Built-in Oven - Stainless Steel
record.shortdescription: Make more in your kitchen with the Hotpoint Built-In Oven (S19 891 SC IX). Featuring 73L of cook...
record.longdescription: Make more in your kitchen with the Hotpoint Built-In Oven (S19 891 SC IX). Featuring 73L of cooking capacity, an A+ energy rating, plus impressive technology to ensure even heat for an absolutely all-round cooking experience. With Multiflow Technology, a new style of convection system creates an all-enveloping heat flow which pushes heat into every inch of the oven cavity for consistently even, delicious dishes every time – whichever shelf you’re using. Including a Meat Probe to aid you in serving up succulent joints and birds, temperature is monitored with cooking stopping automatically once the probe displays the pre-set temperature for your dish. This helps to prevent over-cooking or cold spots that can ruin a meal. Going beyond just helping you to create amazing eats, the Hotpoint Built-In Oven also brings a wealth of features for easy use. Incorporating Telescopic Shelving to take the burden of heavy dishes, have both hands free to lift them in and out of the oven with a lower risk of mishaps and spillages. The triple glazed, Soft Close door also ensures gentle contact on closing to prevent unnecessary heat loss and temperature fluctuations. When it comes to cleaning the oven, this model features Catalytic Liners – a self-cleaning system that requires no chemicals as special panels against the oven wall catch food and fat spits, evaporating them during the cooking process. For the hard-to-reach area of the oven roof, the Tilting Grill simply unhooks giving you easy access for cleaning, before sliding back into place. We’ve even applied an Anti-Fingerprint coating to the oven’s exterior to give a resistant finish so the surface is always gleaming and bright. Operated via the easy-to-use Touch Control panel, the Hotpoint Built-In Oven ushers a new era of hassle-free cooking into your home, freeing your time for the more fun things in life without compromising on culinary quality.

record.name: Hotpoint Class 7 SI7 864 SH IX Electric Single Built-in Oven - Stainless Steel
record.shortdescription: Get set for new adventures in the kitchen with the Hotpoint Built-In Oven (S17 864 SH IX). Featu...
record.longdescription: Get set for new adventures in the kitchen with the Hotpoint Built-In Oven (S17 864 SH IX). Featuring a 73L capacity, A+ energy rating, easy cleaning solutions, this model includes excellent tech to ensure the most even cooking results. With multiflow Technology, a new style of convection system creates an all-enveloping heat flow which pushes heat into every inch of the oven cavity for consistently even, delicious dishes every time – whichever shelf you’re using. Ideal for ensuring perfectly risen cakes and breads, plus reducing cold spots in your favourite dishes. Triple glazed, the Soft Close door also ensures gentle contact on closing to prevent unnecessary heat loss and temperature fluctuations. A gift for oven cleaning, this model uses Hydro Clean Technology – a short 35 minute cycle which harnesses the power of steam to remove fat and food residue. Simply wipe with a damp cloth after the cycle completes to restore the like-new appeal. For the hard-to-reach area of the oven roof, the Tilting Grill simply unhooks giving you easy access for cleaning, before sliding back into place. We’ve even applied an Anti-Fingerprint coating to the oven’s exterior to give a resistant finish so the surface is always gleaming and bright. Easily operated through the electronic interface, Push controls sit flush against the fascia for simple cleaning as well as a stylish look. The Hotpoint Built-In Oven makes light work of even the most challenging dishes whilst freeing your time for more moments with the family.
record.metaname: Built in Oven Hotpoint SI7 864 SH IX
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Built in Oven SI7 864 SH IX : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

record.shortdescription: Hotpoint freestanding microwave oven: black
record.longdescription:
Discover a new way of microwave cooking with the Hotpoint Ultimate Collection MWH 2734B Combination Microwave in black.
With Multiwave Technology food receives all around uniformed cooking and defrosting. Using two entry points for the microwaves to meet your food, the entire cavity is filled with power for thorough, even heating.
The Hotpoint Ultimate Collection MWH MWH 2734B Combination Microwave creates your favourite meals in less time than conventional cooking methods.
Use the Automatic Functions to cook popcorn, rice, pasts, quiches chicken, fish, vegetables and bread with a single program selection. Together with Forced Air and fan assistance heat is all encapsulating for supreme cooking with no cold spots.
Operated via Touch Control, this appliance gives you 25L of capacity with up to 800w distributed across six power levels for tailored power when you need it.

record.name: Hotpoint Class 4 DD4 541 IX Built-in Oven - Stainless Steel
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Class 4 DD4 541 IX Electric Double Built-in Oven - Stainless Steel
record.longdescription:
Enjoy extra versatility in the kitchen with the Hotpoint Built-In Electric Double Oven (DD4 541 IX) in classic stainless steel. 
With a huge 74L of capacity in the main over, you can cook with ease everything from a splendid Sunday roast to the everyday pasta bakes with trimmings.  Three automatic functions give you the option for; Multi-Level, Slow Cooking or Defrosting.
Thanks to a Circulaire Fan approach you can reduce cooking time by 20% through a clever combination of fan and rear element heat production to ensure even cooking between the shelves. A great function if you love to batch bake or create delicious pastries.
Within the top oven, enjoy an extra 42L of space with option to cook traditionally or grill.
Complete with three shelves, plus a roasting and grill pan, you’re all set for the next culinary adventure that takes your fancy.

record.longdescription:
Make more in your kitchen with the Hotpoint Built-In Double Oven.
With 70L of cooking capacity within the main oven, there’s room aplenty for all you culinary adventures, plus seven automatic functions including; roast, pastries and slow cooking to ensure you always have the right temperature and timings for great results.
Using Circulaire Fan Technology, reduce cooking time by 20% through a clever combination of fan and rear element heat production to ensure even cooking between the shelves. A great function if you love to batch bake.
Incorporating Telescopic Shelving to take the burden of heavy dishes, have both hands free to lift them in and out of the oven with a lower risk of mishaps and spillages. 
Within the top oven, enjoy a further 42L of cooking space with option of traditional cooking, single or double grilling.
To make sure cleaning’s a breeze, this model features Catalytic Liners – a self-cleaning system that requires no chemicals as special panels against the oven wall catch food and fat spits, evaporating them during the cooking process.
Finished with Push Push Controls for a flawless aesthetic, the Hotpoint Built-In Double Oven makes cooking as much pleasure as eating.

record.name: Hotpoint Ultima EG900X S Cooker - Stainless Steel
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint electric freestanding cooker: 90cm
record.longdescription: The Hotpoint CH10750GFS Gas Range Cooker comes in classic and traditional cream finish measures a mega 100cm wide with a combined oven space of over 120litres of cooking capacity and 6-gas burner hob with cast iron pan supports and a double crown wok burner ideal for large and cooking specialist households. It comes with a 61L gas main oven, 63L gas conventional oven, gas grill with drop down door and a warming drawer compartment. Each oven cavity is rated B for energy efficiency and is fitted with an interior light and see-through door, to help you keep a track of the cooking process. For your safety, The flame safety device senses when the flame has been extinguished and automatically cuts off the gas supply preventing a dangerous gas leak. For easy maintenance, the cooker uses stay-clean catalytic liners which work with the heat of the oven to break down grease and the build-up of fat.

record.shortdescription: All you need in the kitchen for serving up delicious meals, the Ultima DUI 611PX Cooker combines...
record.longdescription: All you need in the kitchen for serving up delicious meals, the Ultima DUI 611PX Cooker combines the latest induction technology for super-fast cooking and pyrolytic self-cleaning programs to keep your time free for great entertaining and more of the things you love. With 58L of capacity in the main oven cavity and fan assistance, there’s ample room for cooking your Sunday roast or a fleet of delicious mains with side accompaniments. Featuring an integrated grill, you can also brown to perfection, all within the same space. Keeping safety a priority the Cool Touch Door ensures a reduced risk of injury to hands big and small. Complementing the ability to roast, bake and grill with ease, the hob features our latest Induction Technology. Magnetic fields create a superior, versatile surface which heats only the pan, not the area around it. Reducing energy dispersion by 10%, it’s great news for you energy bills whilst ensuring perfectly even results, every time. When it comes to the arduous task of keeping your oven in tip-top condition, the Ultima DUI6 11PX Cooker excels once more. Using a fast clean Pyrolytic Cycle, the oven heats to around 500ºc burning away fat and food residue to a tidy pile of ash, ready to be wiped away for an incredibly easy and convenient solution. Unleash the inner culinary master with the Hotpoint Ultima DUI6 11PX Cooker, your ticket to delicious meals whatever space you have available in your kitchen.

record.name: Hotpoint Ultima S-Line FTCD 972 6PM1 Tumble Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint heat pump tumble dryer: freestanding, 9kg
record.longdescription:
Dedicated to caring for the fabrics your love, the Hotpoint Ultima S-Line Tumble Dryer in polar white combines a family-sized 9kg capacity with programs devoted to prolonging the vibrancy in your clothes, and an A++ energy rating to save money. 
Featuring Heat Pump Technology, cooler temperatures are used to dry your clothes so fibres experience less stress, pulling and friction. By using a clever repeat and recycle system, hot air is reheated and passed back through the drum over and over until your clothes are dry. This means lower energy waste and a bigger smile as you save up to 50% in energy compared to standard dryers.
Working with our Soft Motion motor, you get precise control of your drying to retain softness and colour richness, while Sensor Drying ensures your laundry loads only use the resources they need, the clever sensors stopping the cycle when clothes are perfectly dried.
With an Anti-Allergy cycle to reduce allergens that can affect sensitive skin, plus Anti-Tangle to help liberate your time from the ironing board, and Gold Woolmark dedicated to keep woollens soft – clothes get the respect they deserve.
An ideal model for family homes, the easy-to-use LCD display, the Delay Timer lets you pick a time to tumble that best suits your schedule, so laundry will always work in with your life, giving you more moments for the things you love.

record.name: Hotpoint Aquarius ECF 87BP Tumble Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint condenser tumble dryer: freestanding, 8kg - ECF 87BP UK
record.longdescription: The Hotpoint ECF 87BP UK Condenser Tumble Dryer with 8kg drum capacity provides complete care for all your laundry. Featuring Fibre Protect+, this dryer includes a range of programmes specially designed to dry a wide variety of fabrics ensuring your laundry is kept looking great and in perfect condition. Sensor Dry technology reduces energy consumption and protects your clothes from over-drying. By monitoring the moisture levels inside the drum, the dryer stops automatically when the clothes reach the drying level selected, be it iron-ready or ready-to-wear there are 7 levels to choose from. Allergy UK approved to care for sensitive skin, our Anti-Allergy programme neutralises and removes 99.9% of major allergens including dust mites and pollen. Reverse tumble action ensures clothes dry evenly and without tangling together, making sure your laundry is as crease-free as possible.

record.name: Hotpoint Smart + HDFO 3C24 W C Dishwasher - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Smart + HDFO 3C24 W C Dishwasher - White
record.longdescription:
Making more time for the things you love, the Hotpoint Smart+ HDF0 3C24 W C UK Dishwasher in white lets you breeze through the washing up.
Featuring our exceptional 3D Zone Wash Technology, allowing you to choose between 40% extra energy efficiency or 40% more washing power, delivered to your choice of internal baskets for maximum cleaning on stubborn, baked-on food. 
Working in conjunction with FlexiLoad, alter the set-up of the interior cavity to suits you needs with special colour coding to guide you towards exceptional space creation for larger pots and dishes. With a versatile sliding cutlery tray positioned above the top basket, the Hotpoint HDF0 3C24 W C UK Dishwasher offers you extra space for your cutlery, knives and utensils. 
Providing enough space for up to 14 places settings and featuring a 9L cycle to efficiently clean your dishes using only the resources necessary resources. The Digital Interface lets you easily select the best program for your needs, including Rapid, Soak and Half-Load cycles.
Including the Hotpoint Inverter Motor, thanks to new algorithms and improved insulation, our dishwashers now run at just 44dB which is the same noise level as a library. Providing more power with precise control over cleaning performance, it’s our most advanced motor yet.
Complete with a Stainless Steel Tub for better hygiene, for an extra level of clean choose the Sanitizing Program. Using a special cleaning solution while the machine’s empty, the cavity’s kept in tip-top condition.
Including a Counter Balanced Door for extra safety, this model runs with a Silent motor and comes with an A++ energy rating.
record.metaname: Freestanding Dishwasher Hotpoint HDFO 3C24 W C UK
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Freestanding Dishwasher HDFO 3C24 W C UK : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

record.name: Hotpoint Care Plus HFO 3T222 WG Dishwasher - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Care Plus HFO 3T222 WG Dishwasher - White
record.longdescription:
Take back the best part of your day by letting the Hotpoint Care Plus HFO 3T222 WG Dishwasher breeze through the washing up for you. Taking care of 14 place settings and using only 9 litres of water per cycle, this model will even care for your water bill. 
Featuring our exceptional 3D Zone Wash Technology, allowing you to choose between 40% extra energy efficiency or 40% more washing power, delivered to your choice of internal baskets for maximum cleaning on stubborn, baked-on food.
Our tough, long-lasting stainless steel interior & 3-stage water filtration gives you effective, hygienic cleaning power that keeps bacteria at bay, for an extra level of clean choose the Sanitizing Program. Using a special cleaning solution while the machine’s empty, the cavity’s kept in tip-top condition.
Including the Hotpoint Inverter Motor, with new algorithms and improved insulation our dishwashers now run at just 43dB. Providing more power with precise control over cleaning performance, it’s our most advanced motor yet.
Designed with versatility in mind, Flexiload lets you alter the set-up of the interior cavity’s upper and lower baskets, with special colour coding to guide you towards exceptional space creation for larger pots and dishes.
Hotpoint’s Glass Care allows you to easily load your precious crystalware into a foldable holder and rest at ease while the dedicated Glass Care Cycle takes care of the rest. Giving your glassware a gentle clean keeping them sparking as if brand new. 
Including a Counter Balanced Door for extra safety, a 24hour Delay Timer so you can schedule sparking dishes for when you are ready to unload and A++ energy rating, the Hotpoint Care Plus HFO 3T222 WG Dishwasher will be a welcomed addition to any family home.

record.name: Hotpoint Aquarius TVFS 73B GG.9 Tumble Dryer - Graphite
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint air-vented tumble dryer: freestanding, 7kg - TVFS 73B GG.9 UK
record.longdescription: The Hotpoint TVFS 73B GP.9 (UK) Freestanding Vented Tumble Dryer comes in a Graphite finish to complement any setting and features a 7kg drum capacity. This appliance is designed to protect your garments and features some of our newest care technology. Features include the Fibre Care option, which has been specially designed for delicate clothes and automatically adjusts settings so that the lowest temperature is being used for a longer duration to ensure a thorough but gentle dry; Anti-Tangle technology, which uses a reverse tumble action to ensure that your clothes dry evenly and without tangling together to keep them looking better for longer; and our Anti-Ageing technology, which utilises an innovative wave drum design to lift clothes softly on a cushion of air to help maintain their natural softness and colour. This appliance also includes the Sensor Drying option, which enables you to 'set and forget' your drying with the knowledge that it will dry perfectly to the level you have specified.

record.name: Hotpoint Ultima HFO 3P23 WL Dishwasher - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Ultima HFO 3P23 WL Dishwasher - White
record.longdescription:
Save time and effort on the everyday washing up with the Hotpoint Ultima HFO 3P23 WL UK dishwasher in white. This model makes light work of an impressive 15 place settings. Perfect for a dinner party clear up. 
Featuring our exceptional 3D Zone Wash Technology, allowing you to choose between 40% extra energy efficiency or 40% more washing power, delivered to your choice of internal baskets for maximum cleaning on stubborn, baked-on food.
Including the Hotpoint Inverter Motor, with new algorithms and improved insulation our dishwashers now run at just 43dB. Providing more power with precise control over cleaning performance, it’s our most advanced motor yet.
Designed with versatility in mind, Flexiload lets you alter the set-up of the interior cavity’s upper and lower baskets, with special colour coding to guide you towards exceptional space creation for larger pots and dishes. For additional flexibility and space this model features a third full size basket. 
Complete with a Stainless Steel Tub for increased hygiene and drying results. For an extra level of clean choose the Sanitizing Program for normal or heavily soiled crockery and cutlery.
Including a Counter Balanced Door for extra safety, A++ energy rating and a 24hour Delay Timer so you can schedule sparking dishes for when you are ready to unload.

record.longdescription:
In a stainless steel finish, the Hotpoint Built-In Gas Hob uses cast iron supports to keep your pans safe and stable, with a combination of fast, semi-fast and standard burners to accommodate all your cooking needs.
Using Direct Flame Technology, enjoy perfectly even heat across the entire surface on your pan thanks to 420 tiny holes which direct the heat upwards to prevent energy loss around the pan. Saving up to 20% in energy and cooking time – it’s the most effective way to cook on gas yet.
Each area uses an automatic ignition switch and is fitted with a flame safety device to ensure that when the flame goes out, the gas supply stops, allowing you to slumber with peace of mind.

record.name: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 95 T1I W Fridge Freezer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 95 T1I W Fridge Freezer - White
record.longdescription:
Offering practical storage solutions for your food, Hotpoint’s Day1 TDC 95 T1I W Fridge Freezer has plenty of space for the food shop, leftovers and beverages with 356L capacity, it is easy to find items at the back of the fridge with ease thanks to the sliding shelves that pull out by 7cm.
 Featuring the 3in1 Zone, cool hot food down from 70°C to 3°C extra-fast with a blast of cool air. Alternatively, gently defrost food, protecting its taste and texture, or even chill food just above freezing temperature, ideal for storing fresh meat and fish.
 Precision Temperature Control ensures cool air is distributed throughout the fridge cavity to create a constant temperature, keeping your food perfectly fresh for longer.
 You’ll never need to defrost your appliance with Frost Free technology which stops the build-up of ice, It works by keeping the perfect humidity level in your freezer and circulating fresh air around the compartment.
 With an A+ energy rating that provides optimum energy efficiency giving high performance while saving you money on your utility bills, Hotpoint’s Day1 TDC 95 T1I W Fridge Freezer takes care of all your cooling needs, whilst seamlessly suiting the style of your kitchen.
record.metaname: Freestanding fridge freezer Hotpoint TDC 95 T1I W

record.name: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 95 T1I G Fridge Freezer - Graphite
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 95 T1I G Fridge Freezer - Graphite
record.longdescription:
The TDC 95 T1I G features Frost Free Technology, both the fridge and freezer units benefit from a homogenous cold air flow to stop the formation of frost. Promoting better and longer lasting food preservation, the separate airflow control prevents odour and flavour migration so you only ever get the tastes you love.
There’s plenty of space for the food shop, leftovers and beverages with 235L of refrigerator space, distributed across four glass shelves to make organising a breeze. Plus, with a dedicated Crisper, all your leafy greens can keep their natural goodness while being protected against knocks that can cause them to spoil more rapidly.
Including a 3-in-1 Drawer you can now enjoy; Super Cool+ to provide a cold boost of air to drop food temperature from 70° to 3° in 30% less time – ideal if you have leftovers to store in a hurry. Chill Mode produces a constantly optimum environment for preserving meat and fish, whilst Safe Defrost helps you thaw food whilst prohibiting bacteria growth and tissue degradation in delicate foods such as white fish.
Providing an extra guard, this model features Hygiene+ Protection – a special anti-bacterial coating on the inner walls, designed to kill bacteria and mould that can affect the shelf life of your produce. This helps lock in taste for longer, and prevent food wastage – good news for environmental and budget conscious shopper.
Complementing the exceptional preservation within the fridge, within the freezer cavity, enjoy 124L of space distributed across four deep.
Keeping food preservation paramount, the Super Freeze function works to rapid-freeze fresh food so the internal temperature remains constant and freshness is retained for longer. It’s the perfect energy efficient solution when you’re unpacking the food shop or storing a big cooking session.
A handsome eye-catching design with LED illumination and A+ energy rating.

record.name: Hotpoint Aquarius HSIE 2B19 Integrated Dishwasher
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Aquarius HSIE 2B19 Integrated Dishwasher
record.longdescription:
With enough capacity to hold up to 10 place settings the Hotpoint Aquarius Dishwasher (HSIE 2B19) is great for cleaning up after dinner parties and daily mealtimes. 
Featuring a tough stainless steel tub, Hygiene+ helps keep bacteria at bay whilst improving drying results, even on plastics. 
With a total 6 programs to choose from, Dual Space gives you versatility in how you stack your load. This means that cumbersome items such as large pans and odd-shaped platters have enough room, without compromising the cleaning power on smaller items such as cutlery and cups. 
Slim-lined by design with an A+ energy rating and featuring a 10L wash program, the Hotpoint Aquarius Dishwasher considers efficiency in everything it does, whilst the Silent Motor means you’ll hardly notice the hard work its doing.

record.name: Hotpoint Aquarius TCFS 93B GP.9 Tumble Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint condenser tumble dryer: freestanding, 9kg
record.longdescription: The Hotpoint TCFS 93B GP.9 (UK) Freestanding Tumble Dryer comes in a classic white finish to complement any setting and features a large 9kg drum capacity. This appliance is designed to protect your garments and features some of our newest care technology. Features include the Fibre Care option, which has been specially designed for delicate clothes and, with the press of a button, automatically adjusts settings so that the lowest temperature is being used for a longer duration to ensure a thorough but gentle dry, Anti-Tangle technology, which uses a reverse tumble action to ensure that your clothes dry evenly and without tangling together to keep them looking better for longer, and our Anti-Ageing technology, which utilises an innovative wave drum design to lift clothes softly on a cushion of air to help maintain their natural softness and colour. This appliance also includes a large capacity water bottle, which means you can get through more loads without emptying, and our Purse Filter, which has a simple design making it easy to remove and empty without getting covered in fluff!

record.name: Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M11 82XB Tumble Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint heat pump tumble dryer: freestanding, 8kg
record.longdescription:
Dedicated to caring for the fabrics your love, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M11 82XB Tumble Dryer combines a family-sized 8kg capacity with programs devoted to prolonging the vibrancy in your clothes, and an A++ Energy Rating to save money.
Our impressive Heat Pump Technology allows the moisture to be removed from your clothes and recycled through the machine, providing you with perfectly dry clothes. This technology is more of an economical approach to tumble drying, as it can save you up to 50% in energy consumption. The cooler temperature, alongside a gentle drum movement ensures delicate care for your clothes during the cycle, giving them the adequate treatment they deserve.
Reduce wrinkles and make ironing easier than ever with Pre-Iron cycle.
Thanks to the patented ActiveCare technology, the new Hotpoint tumble dryer reduces fabric wear out by up to 40%, minimising stress on your clothes, keeping them looking their best for longer.
The clever Anti-Allergy option allows higher temperatures to remove bacteria and allergens from your laundry. Great for those that suffer from allergies or have sensitive skin.
Easily controllable through the LED display the Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M11 82XB Tumble Dryer helps to save you time, money and effort – every day.

record.name: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 85 T1I G Fridge Freezer - Graphite
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 85 T1I G Fridge Freezer - Graphite
record.longdescription:
Offering practical storage solutions for your food, Hotpoint’s Day TDC 85 T1I G Fridge Freezer has plenty of space for the food shop, leftovers and beverages with 327L capacity, it is easy to find items at the back of the fridge with ease thanks to the sliding shelves that pull out by 7cm.
 Featuring the 3in1 Zone, cool hot food down from 70°C to 3°C extra-fast with a blast of cool air. Alternatively, gently defrost food, protecting its taste and texture, or even chill food just above freezing temperature, ideal for storing fresh meat and fish.
 Precision Temperature Control ensures cool air is distributed throughout the fridge cavity to create a constant temperature, keeping your food perfectly fresh for longer.
 You’ll never need to defrost your appliance with Frost Free technology which stops the build-up of ice, It works by keeping the perfect humidity level in your freezer and circulating fresh air around the compartment.
 With an A+ energy rating that provides optimum energy efficiency giving high performance while saving you money on your utility bills, Hotpoint’s Day1 TDC 85 T1I G Fridge Freezer takes care of all your cooling needs, whilst seamlessly suiting the style of your kitchen.
record.metaname: Freestanding fridge freezer Hotpoint TDC 85 T1I G
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Freestanding fridge freezer TDC 85 T1I G : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

record.name: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 95 T1I G Fridge Freezer - Graphite
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint Day1 TDC 95 T1I G Fridge Freezer - Graphite
record.longdescription:
The TDC 95 T1I G features Frost Free Technology, both the fridge and freezer units benefit from a homogenous cold air flow to stop the formation of frost. Promoting better and longer lasting food preservation, the separate airflow control prevents odour and flavour migration so you only ever get the tastes you love.
There’s plenty of space for the food shop, leftovers and beverages with 235L of refrigerator space, distributed across four glass shelves to make organising a breeze. Plus, with a dedicated Crisper, all your leafy greens can keep their natural goodness while being protected against knocks that can cause them to spoil more rapidly.
Including a 3-in-1 Drawer you can now enjoy; Super Cool+ to provide a cold boost of air to drop food temperature from 70° to 3° in 30% less time – ideal if you have leftovers to store in a hurry. Chill Mode produces a constantly optimum environment for preserving meat and fish, whilst Safe Defrost helps you thaw food whilst prohibiting bacteria growth and tissue degradation in delicate foods such as white fish.
Providing an extra guard, this model features Hygiene+ Protection – a special anti-bacterial coating on the inner walls, designed to kill bacteria and mould that can affect the shelf life of your produce. This helps lock in taste for longer, and prevent food wastage – good news for environmental and budget conscious shopper.
Complementing the exceptional preservation within the fridge, within the freezer cavity, enjoy 124L of space distributed across four deep.
Keeping food preservation paramount, the Super Freeze function works to rapid-freeze fresh food so the internal temperature remains constant and freshness is retained for longer. It’s the perfect energy efficient solution when you’re unpacking the food shop or storing a big cooking session.
A handsome eye-catching design with LED illumination and A+ energy rating.

record.name: Hotpoint ActiveCook ACP 778 C/BA Induction Ceramic Hob - Black
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint induction glass-ceramic hob
record.longdescription: The Hotpoint ACP 778 C/BA Induction glass-ceramic Hob comes complete with 8 induction rings that will cater for all your cooking needs. With Active Cook, you can divide your cooking surface into 4 independent zones at different temperature levels. This means you can move your pots and pans from one zone to the other without having to touch any controls, making it an easy experience. Fast, as well as efficient, this crowd-pleasing Induction Hob, will boil water faster than a kettle. With its flat glass surface, you can effortlessly wipe clean saving you precious time.

record.name: Hotpoint ACO 654 NE Induction Ceramic Hob - Black
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint induction glass-ceramic hob
record.longdescription:
Take total control in your kitchen with The Hotpoint Active Cook ACC 654 NE Induction hob, complete with automatic functions to help you achieve perfect results with ease whether you’re melting, boiling, simmering or just keeping your dish warm. 
The Active Cook hob also provides you with two sensor cooking functions, ideal for Active Frying and Active Grilling to help you reach that perfect crisp. 
Cook with versatility in mind, the Active Cook hob restricts limitations by allowing you to use all these features with even the biggest of equipment, Flexi Pro allows you to shift even the largest of pans from one zone of the hob to the other giving you full flexibility so you have all the room you need for even the largest of dinner parties.
Putting the power at your fingertips touch controls offer precision cooking with 18 power levels, the accompanying booster function offers extra power and control when an injection of heat is needed, perfect when boiling water or searing meat. The Hotpoint Induction ACC 654 NE hob tackles every cooking task with ease and style.

record.name: Hotpoint NT M10 81WK Tumble Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint heat pump tumble dryer: freestanding, 8kg
record.longdescription:
Dedicated to caring for the fabrics your love, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M10 81WK Tumble Dryer combines a family-sized 8kg capacity with programs devoted to prolonging the vibrancy in your clothes, and an A+ Energy Rating to save money.
Our impressive Heat Pump Technology allows the moisture to be removed from your clothes and recycled through the machine, providing you with perfectly dry clothes. This technology is more of an economical approach to tumble drying, as it can save you up to 50% in energy consumption. The cooler temperature, alongside a gentle drum movement ensures delicate care for your clothes during the cycle, giving them the adequate treatment they deserve.
The clever Anti-Allergy option allows higher temperatures to remove bacteria and allergens from your laundry. Great for those that suffer from allergies or have sensitive skin.
Easily controllable through the LED display the Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M10 81WK Tumble Dryer helps to save you time, money and effort – every day.

record.name: Hotpoint Gentle Steam FA4S 544 IX H Oven - Stainless Steel
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint built in electric oven: inox
record.longdescription:
Make more in your kitchen with the multifunctional Hotpoint Gentle Steam Built-in FA4S 544 IX H steam oven, from innovative cleaning solutions with the tailored steam cleaning option to multifunctional cooking. 

This oven allows you to achieve perfect results by selecting one of the three gentle steam programmes designed to maintain the nutrients of your food, simply pour water into the cavity of the oven, select one of the three gentle steam options via the programme guide to instruct you through the ideal temperature, time and shelf in the oven. Just set the temperature and the oven will do the rest.

All this, combining with Multiflow Technology which ensures you reach perfectly even cooking results by distributing heat evenly throughout the cavity, all while preserving the goodness of your food for a healthy, nutritious meal.

Through the combination of Steam cooking and conventional cooking methods, the Gentle Steam FA4S 544 IX H Oven allows you to create nutritious and tasty meals without fuss or complication.

record.name: Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M11 92SK Tumble Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint heat pump tumble dryer: freestanding, 9kg
record.longdescription:
Dedicated to caring for the fabrics your love, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M11 92SB Tumble Dryer combines a family-sized 9kg capacity with programs devoted to prolonging the vibrancy in your clothes, and an A++ Energy Rating to save money.
Our impressive Heat Pump Technology allows the moisture to be removed from your clothes and recycled through the machine, providing you with perfectly dry clothes. This technology is more of an economical approach to tumble drying, as it can save you up to 50% in energy consumption. The cooler temperature, alongside a gentle drum movement ensures delicate care for your clothes during the cycle, giving them the adequate treatment they deserve.
Reduce wrinkles and make ironing easier than ever with Pre-Iron cycle.
Thanks to the patented ActiveCare technology, the new Hotpoint tumble dryer reduces fabric wear by up to 40%, minimising stress on your clothes, keeping them looking their best for longer.
The clever Anti-Allergy option allows higher temperatures to remove bacteria and allergens from your laundry. Great for those that suffer from allergies or have sensitive skin.
Easily controllable through the LED display, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NT M11 92SB Tumble Dryer helps to save you time, money and effort – every day.

record.name: Hotpoint Curve MWH 1331 W - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint freestanding microwave oven: white
record.longdescription:
Compact with a unique corner fitting curved design to fit easily in the corner of your worktop.
With MultiWave Technology, microwaves meet your food from two entry points so the entire cavity is uniformly filled for even cooking and defrosting.
Operating with digital display, the Hotpoint Curve MWH 1331 W Microwave delivers up to 700w of power with five power levels to choose from. It also has 13L of cooking space with a 28cm 'dinner plate size' turntable.
Featuring Automatic Functions including defrosting programs for meat, poultry, fish and bread – the Hotpoint Curve MWH 1331 B Microwave is easily controlled via Touch Control and comes with an easy clean cavity.

record.name: Hotpoint Gentle Steam FA4S 541 JBLG H Oven - Black
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint built in electric oven: black
record.longdescription:
Make more in your kitchen with the multifunctional Hotpoint Gentle Steam Built-in FA4S 541 JBLG H steam oven, from innovative cleaning solutions with the tailored steam cleaning option to multifunctional cooking. 

This oven allows you to achieve perfect results by selecting one of the three gentle steam programmes designed to maintain the nutrients of your food, simply pour water into the cavity of the oven, select one of the three gentle steam options via the programme guide to instruct you through the ideal temperature, time and shelf in the oven. Just set the temperature and the oven will do the rest.
Cook with ease, the FA4S 541 JBLG H comes with Telescopic Shelving to take the burden of heavy dishes lowering the risk of mishaps and spillages as well as a Tilting Grill to ensure the cavity and hard to reach areas retain their original shine.

All this, combining with Multiflow Technology which ensures you reach perfectly even cooking results by distributing heat evenly throughout the cavity, all while preserving the goodness of your food for a healthy, nutritious meal.

Through the combination of Steam cooking and conventional cooking methods, the Gentle Steam FA4S 541 JBLG H Oven allows you to create nutritious and tasty meals without fuss or complication.
record.metaname: Built in Oven Hotpoint FA4S 541 JBLG H
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Built in Oven FA4S 541 JBLG H : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

record.name: Hotpoint TS 9960C BF Induction Hob - Black
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint induction glass-ceramic hob
record.longdescription:
Fast, efficient, and easy to clean. The Hotpoint TS 9960C BF Induction hob has it all, from touch control, allowing you to have complete control at your fingertips, to direct access control, giving you the control of each individual cooking zone via the dedicated responsive slider to take advantage of the 18 flexible power levels and booster function when you need that extra bit of power adding to your cooking.
Complete cooking assistance manifests in the form of the My Menu feature, catering for all your cooking needs with a range of 4 cooking methods: melting, boiling, keep warm and slow cooking to assist you to prepare any recipe on any zones. My Menu provides you with extended cooking capabilities to give you a more versatile kitchen experience.
With full control of your hob over a 60cm width, you can take advantage of having full flexibility with your cooking by using Twin FlexiSpace technology, giving you the maximum flexibility and ease of movement, transfer your saucepans from one zone to another, the hob will respond automatically to aid ease of cooking when dishing up your favourite meals and combines brilliantly with the Active Heat feature providing you with 3 independent zones with different temperature levels: low, medium and high. This allows you to move pots and pans from one zone to the other without having to touch any controls, so you can make the most of the different temperatures. 

All of these exciting features ensures the Hotpoint TS 9960C BF is your perfect kitchen assistant
record.metaname: Induction Hob Hotpoint TS 9960C BF
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Induction Hob TS 9960C BF : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

Complete cooking assistance manifests in the form of the My Menu feature, catering for all your cooking needs with a range of 4 cooking methods: melting, boiling, keep warm and slow cooking to assist you preparing any recipe on any zone. My Menu provides you with extended cooking capabilities to give you a more versatile cooking kitchen experience.
With full control of your hob over a 60cm width, you can take advantage of having full flexibility with your cooking by using FlexiDuo technology, giving you ease of movement to transfer your saucepans from one zone to another, and the hob will respond automatically maintaining the same heat level. 
Cementing the fact that style and ease of use doesn’t come more apparent than with the Hotpoint TB 7960C BF Hob.

record.name: Hotpoint HFC 3C26 WC B UK Dishwasher - Black
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint HFC 3C26 WC B UK Dishwasher - Black
record.longdescription:
Sort the clean-up in one swoop with the Hotpoint Extra HFC 3C26 WC B UK Dishwasher in black.
With capacity for 10 place settings, choose between Rapid, Half Load and Eco wash cycles to restore the sparkle to your plates, cups and cutlery.
Dual Space gives you the versatility to alter the height of your top basket in one quick, easy movement. Making more space in the basket below for larger pots and pans, you can change the layout, even if you’re already fully loaded. Plus, with a third sliding tray for long cutlery, there’s space for all your cooking utensils too.
Complemented by programs to suit every event, choose between Rapid, Half Load and Eco, with an 11L cycle for the environmentally minded, and Extra Dry to achieve the very best results, even on plastics.
The stainless steel tub helps to ensure an extra level of hygiene, whilst the 24hr Delay Timer lets you load then pick a time to run the cycle at your convenience.
Super-simple to program through the easy-to-use Digital Display, the Hotpoint Extra HFC 3C26 WC B UK Dishwasher is easy to install into your kitchen and brings an A+ energy rating to help save money on your bills too.

record.longdescription: We proudly introduce the new Hotpoint Active 4 Door Fridge Freezer, the HQ9I MO1L UK comes with flexible storage, big capacity and food preservation at its heart. With a huge total usage capacity of 554 Litres, you have all the space you need for your fresh and frozen food including two sealed crispers and a dedicated Food Care Zone so you can comfortably store your delicate foods. We will ensure your food will stay fresh for longer in your fridge and freezer thanks to Triple Cool Technology which boasts three independent evaporators that works in synergy with Active Oxygen that keeps the bacteria at bay. Furthermore, you can turn your freezer into a fridge whenever you need additional space just at a touch of a button. Explore the benefits of connecting your SmartPhone or tablet which provides tips and guidance for optimal food care remotely. Plus extended capabilities such as drink recipes and product functionalities so you never need to use a manual. Beautiful to look at, the HQ9I MO1L UK allows you to see everything inside your refrigerator with theatre LED lighting and easy-to-use Touch User-interface, so you can have total control of your appliance with just your fingertips. With its robust structure, stylish bright finish why not entice your guests with the view of the modern and sleek look of the Active 4 Door.

 Featuring our exceptional 3D Zone Wash Technology, experience 40% more washing power deSharedred to your choice of internal baskets for maximum cleaning on stubborn, baked-on food.

record.name: Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 845 GC A UK N Washing Machine - Graphite
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 845 GC A UK N Washing Machine - Graphite
record.longdescription:
For an exceptional stain-busting, intuitive laundry solution that protects and cares for your clothes, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 845 GC A UK N Washing Machine is best-in-class for stain removal. Our innovative ActiveCare technology takes care of your clothes by removing more than 100 stains at just 20°C*, so you can wear your favourite clothes time and time again.
 Maintain hygiene and freshness in the most natural way with the Steam Pack. The Steam Hygiene & Steam Refresh cycles provide the ultimate care and protection for keeping your laundry fresh and perfectly clean. Steam Refresh provides a dedicated cycle to freshen clothes without the need for a full wash. The cycle takes just 20 minutes with steam penetrating deep into fabrics, making them slightly damp, reducing creases for easier ironing. The Steam Hygiene cycle provides the ultimate care and protection for a totally hygienic wash. Steam hygiene injects steam directly into the drum at the end of the cycle, removing up to 99.9% of the most common bacteria without the use of chemical additives.
 Dropped an item on the way to the washing machine? With Hotpoint Stop&Add you can add laundry to the wash cycle during the first few minutes of the cycle without compromising on wash performance. You can also choose either to speed up the cycle or save energy thanks to the Rapid | Eco option. With the Rapid option, the wash duration is reduced by up to 50%, without compromising on washing results. With the Eco option, the washing machine reduces energy consumption by up to 20%, making it gentle on your pocket. 
 Keep your laundry soft and help to reduce creasing with Final Care, this option will activate a special tumbling action for up to 6 hours after the end of the cycle.
 Reduce bacteria build-up by 99.99% in your washing machine’s door seal thanks to antimicrobial protection, so your machine stays perfectly clean.
 Easily operated through the large LED display, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 845 GC A Washing Machine gives you more time back for the things you love.

record.name: Hotpoint HIP 4O539 WLEGT UK Integrated Dishwasher
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint HIP 4O539 WLEGT UK Integrated Dishwasher
record.longdescription:
"Save time and effort on the everyday washing up with the Hotpoint HIP 4O539 WLEGT UK Dishwasher with an impressive A++ energy rating. Designed to clean stubborn, heavily soiled items, and even neutralise odours from dishes waiting to be washed, so hand washing is a thing of the past.
Tough on grease and baked-on food, the 3D Zone wash setting adds more cleaning power or improves energy efficiency, depending on your cleaning needs. The combined action of the powerful water jets from the upper and lower spray arms and the variable speed inverter motor, makes sure precisely the right amount of water is used throughout the selected basket.
With 9 programs to choose from you won’t be short of options, the 30 minute quick wash is ideal for lighter loads when you’re In a rush.
The tough interior that protects and cleans, a tough, long lasting stainless steel interior & 3-stage water filtration gives you effective, hygienic cleaning power that keeps bacteria at bay."

record.name: Hotpoint RDGE 9643 W UK N Washer Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint RDGE 9643 W UK N Washer Dryer - White
record.longdescription:
Tackling all your everyday laundry needs, the Aquarius Washer Dryer in white (RDGE 9643 W UK N) delivers great stain removal, a 9kg drum and up to 1600rpm of variable spin power.
Remove 20 of the most stubborn everyday stains in one wash without pre-soaking. Through cleverly managing detergent, saturation, temperature and drum rotations, Hotpoint’s Anti-Stain Technology frees you from pre-treatments and expensive chemicals, whilst delivering the same great, cleaning results.
Steam Refresh provides a dedicated cycle to freshen clothes without the need for a full wash. The cycle takes just 20 minutes, using less than two glasses of water, with steam penetrating deep into fabrics, making them slightly damp, reducing creases for easier ironing.
For those who suffer from sensitivity to pollen, dust and pet dander, this model includes an Anti-Allergy wash and rinse cycle, so effective it removes 99.9% of major allergens and has been awarded the Allergy UK Seal of Approval.
Going beyond the wash cycle, the Aquarius Washer Dryer offers great consideration to your drying needs. 
Taking extra special care of knits, this model has also been awarded the prestigious Woolmark Green – a mark of quality and confidence that your favourite woollen jumper will come out just as soft and shapely as it went in.
A great, all-round machine for every household, the Aquarius Washer Dryer (RDGE 9643 W UK N) in white brings functionality together to help you save time for the more enjoyable aspects of life.

record.name: Hotpoint RD 1076 JD UK N Washer Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint RD 1076 JD UK N Washer Dryer - White
record.longdescription:
Capable of tackling every challenge your household has to offer, with multiple programs including Super Wash, Fast Wash and Eco cycles, the Ultima S-Line is designed for every eventuality whether it’s renewing brightness in school shirts, lifting stubborn marks out of jeans or quickly washing the gym kit ready for another work-out.
Need to get the washing done in a hurry? Our Ready to Wear cycle provides an effective wash and dry cycle in just 45 minutes to help get your day back on track, whilst the Fast Wash cycle offers you another option to quickly get through loads.
Remove stains at lower temperatures
For a washer dryer that’s full of innovative technology to make your life easier, the Ultima S-Line in white (RD 1076 JD UK N) combines a 10kg capacity drum with 16 intuitive features and a one-stop solution for all your laundry needs.
Incorporating Hotpoint’s innovative Direct Injection Technology, remove more than 100 stains at 20° thanks to a superior water and detergent premix injected directly into the wash. By infusing the detergent and water before it reaches your laundry, cleaning enzymes are activated faster, penetrating fibres deeper and delivering up to 60% more cleaning power, even at low temperatures.
Reduce time at the ironing board
By adding a burst of steam at the end of the drying cycle, this Hotpoint Ultima washer dryer can reduce the time you spend at the ironing board. By utilising the power of steam to get between and relax the fibres of your garments, it could reduce your ironing time by up to 25%.
Sensor Drying

record.name: Hotpoint RD 966 JKD UK N Washer Dryer - Black
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint RD 966 JKD UK N Washer Dryer - Black
record.longdescription:
Making laundry a breeze, the Ultima S-Line Washer Dryer (RD 966 JKD UK N) combines innovation in stain removal and sensor drying technology to bring you exceptional results. With a 9kg drum, 16 programs and our cutting-edge approach to washing and drying, even the most stubborn stains are no match for the Ultima S-Line.
Need to get the washing done in a hurry? Our Ready to Wear cycle provides an effective wash and dry cycle in just 45 minutes to help get your day back on track, whilst the Fast Wash cycle offers you another option to quickly get through loads.
Remove stains at lower temperatures
Incorporating Hotpoint’s innovative Direct Injection Technology, remove more than 100 stains at 20° thanks to a superior water and detergent premix injected directly into the wash.
By infusing the detergent and water before it reaches your laundry, cleaning enzymes are activated faster, penetrating fibres deeper and delivering up to 60% more cleaning power, even at low temperatures.
Reduce time at the ironing board
By adding a burst of steam at the end of the drying cycle, this Hotpoint Ultima washer dryer can reduce the time you spend at the ironing board. By utilising the power of steam to get between and relax the fibres of your garments, it could reduce your ironing time by up to 25%.
.
record.metaname: Freestanding Washer Dryer Hotpoint RD 966 JKD UK N
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Freestanding Washer Dryer RD 966 JKD UK N : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

record.name: Hotpoint RDGR 9662 GK UK N Washer Dryer - Graphite
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint RDGR 9662 GK UK N Washer Dryer - Graphite
record.longdescription:
Tackling all your everyday laundry needs, the Aquarius Washer Dryer in graphite (RDGR 9662 GK UK N) delivers great stain removal, a 9kg drum and up to 1600rpm of variable spin power.
Remove 20 of the most stubborn everyday stains in one wash without pre-soaking. Through cleverly managing detergent, saturation, temperature and drum rotations, Hotpoint’s Anti-Stain Technology frees you from pre-treatments and expensive chemicals, whilst delivering the same great, cleaning results.
Steam Refresh provides a dedicated cycle to freshen clothes without the need for a full wash. The cycle takes just 20 minutes, using less than two glasses of water, with steam penetrating deep into fabrics, making them slightly damp, reducing creases for easier ironing.
For those who suffer from sensitivity to pollen, dust and pet dander, this model includes an Anti-Allergy wash and rinse cycle, so effective it removes 99.9% of major allergens and has been awarded the Allergy UK Seal of Approval.
Going beyond the wash cycle, the Aquarius Washer Dryer offers great consideration to your drying needs. 
Taking extra special care of knits, this model has also been awarded the prestigious Woolmark Green – a mark of quality and confidence that your favourite woollen jumper will come out just as soft and shapely as it went in.
A great, all-round machine for every household, the Aquarius Washer Dryer (RDGR 9662 GK UK N) in graphite brings functionality together to help you save time for the more enjoyable aspects of life.
record.metaname: Freestanding Washer Dryer Hotpoint RDGR 9662 GK UK N

record.shortdescription: Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 946 WS A UK N Washing Machine - White
record.longdescription:
"For an exceptional stain-busting, intuitive laundry solution that protects and cares for your clothes, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 946 WS A UK N Washing Machine is best-in-class for stain removal. Our innovative ActiveCare technology takes care of your clothes by removing more than 100 stains at just 20°C*, so you can wear your favourite clothes time and time again.
 Maintain hygiene and freshness in the most natural way with the Steam Pack. The Steam Hygiene & Steam Refresh cycles provide the ultimate care and protection for keeping your laundry fresh and perfectly clean. Steam Refresh provides a dedicated cycle to freshen clothes without the need for a full wash. The cycle takes just 20 minutes with steam penetrating deep into fabrics, making them slightly damp, reducing creases for easier ironing. The Steam Hygiene cycle provides the ultimate care and protection for a totally hygienic wash. Steam hygiene injects steam directly into the drum at the end of the cycle, removing up to 99.9% of the most common bacteria without the use of chemical additives.
 Dropped an item on the way to the washing machine? With Hotpoint Stop&Add you can add laundry to the wash cycle during the first few minutes of the cycle without compromising on wash performance. You can also choose either to speed up the cycle or save energy thanks to the Rapid | Eco option. With the Rapid option, the wash duration is reduced by up to 50%, without compromising on washing results. With the Eco option, the washing machine reduces energy consumption by up to 20%, making it gentle on your pocket. 
 Keep your laundry soft and help to reduce creasing with Final Care, this option will activate a special tumbling action for up to 6 hours after the end of the cycle.
 Reduce bacteria build-up by 99.99% in your washing machine’s door seal thanks to antimicrobial protection, so your machine stays perfectly clean.
 Easily operated through the large LED display, the Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 946 WS A UK N Washing Machine gives you more time back for the things you love.

record.name: Hotpoint RD 964 JD UK N Washer Dryer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint RD 964 JD UK N Washer Dryer - White
record.longdescription:
"Combining the very best technology in stain removal and sensor drying, the Ultima Washer Dryer (RG 964 JD UK N) is set to tackle everything the modern household throws at it. 
Remove stains at lower temperatures
With Hotpoint’s innovative Direct Injection Technology, remove more than 100 stains at 20° thanks to a superior water and detergent premix injected directly into the wash. By infusing the detergent and water together before it reaches your laundry, cleaning enzymes are activated faster, penetrating fibres deeper and delivering up to 60% more cleaning power, even at low temperatures.
Perfect for allergy sufferers
For those who suffer from sensitivity to pollen, dust and pet dander, this model includes Anti-Allergy wash and rinse cycles, so effective it removes 99.9% of major allergens and has been awarded the Allergy UK Seal of Approval. 
Sensor drying
Going beyond the wash, built-in sensors means there are optimum drying cycles for every fabric type. With a dedicated Woolmark Platinum setting to pay special attention to your favourite knitwear, slower drum movements reduce friction and lessen stress to the fibres to lock in softness for longer. 
Super silent
Delivering variable spin speeds of up to 1400rpm, the Super Silent Motor prevents your laundry duties from disturbing family moments as special sound insulting panels and an advanced brushless motor reduces noise levels dramatically. 
Taking on every challenge, with multiple programs including Super Wash, Fast Wash, Eco and Delicate cycles, the Ultima Washer Dryer is fit to tackle every eventuality whether it’s renewing brightness in school shirts, lifting stubborn marks out of jeans or quickly washing the gym kit ready for another day’s work-out.
record.metaname: Freestanding Washer Dryer Hotpoint RD 964 JD UK N

record.name: Hotpoint H5NT 811I W H 1 Fridge Freezer - White
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint H5NT 811I W H 1 Fridge Freezer - White
record.longdescription:
Generous in space and built to cope with the ever-changing demands of the modern family, the Hotpoint H5NT 811I W H 1 Fridge Freezer in a white finish offers the perfect balance between performance, with an A+ energy rating and food preservation technology, all while boasting an impressive capacity of over 300L.
 Food preservation starts here, with Fresh Zone+ you can ensure the freshness of your fruit and veg can be preserved in the humidity-controlled drawer, paired with the Fresh Zone 0°, creating an environment ideal for preserving delicate foods, such as meat and fish. 
 The cooling environment is only enhanced by the luxury of Active Oxygen technology which releases tri-oxygen molecules (O3) into the fridge, preventing bacteria growth by up to 90%, so your fridge stays hygienically clean.
 While the H5NT 811I W H 1 keeps food fresher for longer, you can rest assured that you’ll never need to defrost your Fridge Freezer again thanks to Total No Frost technology saving you time, energy and money.

record.longdescription:
Flagship model of the Ultima S-Line range, Hotpoint’s Ultima S-Line Washer Dryer (RD 1176 JD UK N) in white brings together exceptional stain removal technology with cutting-edge sensor drying for a complete laundry experience that cares for your clothes. 
Capable of tackling every challenge your household has to offer, with multiple programs including Super Wash, Fast Wash and Eco cycles, the Ultima S-Line is designed for every eventuality whether it’s renewing brightness in school shirts, lifting stubborn marks out of jeans or quickly washing the gym kit ready for another work-out. 
Remove stains at lower temperatures
Incorporating Hotpoint’s innovative Direct Injection Technology, remove more than 100 stains at 20° thanks to a superior water and detergent premix injected directly into the wash. By infusing the detergent and water before it reaches your laundry, cleaning enzymes are activated faster, penetrating fibres deeper and delivering up to 60% more cleaning power, even at low temperatures. 
Remedying those emergency laundry moments, Ready to Wear provides an effective wash and dry cycle in just 45 minutes to help get your day back on track, whilst the Fast Wash cycle offers you another option to quickly get through loads. 
Perfect for allergy sufferers

record.name: Hotpoint HMCB 70301 UK Integrated Fridge Freezer
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint HMCB 70301 UK Integrated Fridge Freezer
record.longdescription:
A stylish and efficient model, the Aquarius Built-In Fridge Freezer (HMCB 70301 UK) delivers 195L of cooling capacity within the refrigerator and 80L within the freezer. 
With the refrigerator cavity boasting three glass shelves, there’s ample room for all your dairy, meats and treats, whilst the integrated wine rack will keep your favourite beverages and tipples at the perfect temperature for a cool refreshment. 
Enjoy crisp salads, crunchy vegetables and juicy fruits for longer using the dedicated salad bin, while the adjustable thermostat gives you the power to ensure the temperature is appropriate for both the light and heavily stocked days. 
Within the freezer, three deep, clear-fronted drawers, storage and organisation of your stockpiled goods and sweet treats is a breeze.
Using Low Frost Technology in the freezer chamber to reduce ice formation. By building the evaporator into the outside structure of the unit opposed to traditional grills on the inside ice formation is greatly reduced, with any build-up easily removed thank to the flat surface. 
Complete with adjustable hinges and reversible doors, the Aquarius Built-In Fridge Freezer is easily incorporated into every kitchen or utility room.

record.name: Hotpoint H7T 911A MX H AQUA 1 Fridge Freezer - Stainless Steel
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint H7T 911A MX H AQUA 1 Fridge Freezer - Stainless Steel
record.longdescription:
"Generous in space and built to cope with the ever-changing demands of the modern family, the Hotpoint H7T 911A MX H AQUA 1 Fridge Freezer in a Mirror Inox finish offers the perfect balance between performance, with an impressive capacity of over 350L.
Food preservation starts here, with Fresh Zone+ you can ensure the freshness of your fruit and veg can be preserved in the humidity-controlled drawer, paired with the Fresh Zone 0°, creating an environment ideal for preserving delicate foods, such as meat and fish. 
The cooling environment is only enhanced by the luxury of Hotpoint’s Active Oxygen technology which removes the bad odours from your fridge, such as strong cheeses and fish, to keep bacteria at bay and preserve the freshness of your food for longer.
Not forgetting the dedicated Wine Rack, a great storage accessory for keeping your beverages chilled and tucked away neatly to maximise the space in your fridge and the added luxury of having instant access to chilled water straight from your fridge door.
While the H7T 911A MX H AQUA 1 keeps food fresher for longer, you can rest assured that you’ll never need to defrost your Fridge Freezer again thanks to Total No Frost technology saving you time, energy and money.
record.metaname: Freestanding fridge freezer Hotpoint H7T 911A MX H AQUA 1
record.metalongdescription: Hotpoint Freestanding fridge freezer H7T 911A MX H AQUA 1 : discover the specifications of our home appliances and bring the innovation into your house and family.

record.name: Hotpoint HMCB 505011 UK Integrated Fridge Freezer
record.shortdescription: Hotpoint HMCB 505011 UK Integrated Fridge Freezer
record.longdescription:
"The Hotpoint Aquarius Built-In Fridge Freezer (HMCB50501 AA) offers an ideal combination of cool storage for families and households who simply love to cook. 
With 154L of cooling storage distributed across 3 refrigerator shelves and wine rack, the freeze cavity delivers a further 110L of capacity within three deep, clear-fronted drawers, for easy organisation of your produce.
Featuring Low Frost Technology in the freezer chamber, ice formation is greatly reduced. By building the evaporator into the outside structure of the unit opposed to traditional grills on the inside ice formation is greatly reduced, with any build-up easily removed due to the flat surfaces. 
With an adjustable thermostat you stay in control of temperature, ensuring things are just right on the heavy and lightly stocked days. With reversible doors it’s easy to integrate the Aquarius Built-In Fridge Freezer into every kitchen suite.
"

Use the dedicated salad bin for keeping snap in your vegetables, crispness in your salad leaves and blush in your fruits for even longer, whilst the two glass shelves provide amble space for beverages and cooking staples. 
The three freezer drawers allow you plenty of space for stock-piled essentials, whilst their clear fronts make it easy to locate ingredients when you need them.

Giving you exceptional storage and long-lasting freshness in all your favourite ingredients, the Hotpoint Day 1 BCB 8020 AA F C Fridge Freezer is perfect for busy households who love to eat well.
Combining the convenience of a fridge and a freezer in one unit, the BCB 8020 AA F C offers a large storage volume of 296 litres including the Big Crisper drawer which gives plenty of space to store your fruit and vegetables in the perfect place.
Precision Temperature Control ensures cool air is distributed throughout the fridge cavity to create a constant temperature, keeping your food perfectly fresh for longer.

There is also a removal warming rack which is ideal for heating pastries and bread, taking the hassle out of creating a variety of breakfasts for the family. For the impatient toast lover out there, the Hotpoint Ultimate Toaster has a countdown function that allows you to know exactly how long is left before your toast is ready. record.name: Carbon filter type 20

record.longdescription: The Wpro washable carbon hood filter absorbs grease and moisture while cooking, preventing unpleasant odours in the kitchen. With its absorbent action it protects against the spread of bacteria in the air. The Wpro carbon filter has a saturation indicator that changes colour when the filter must be replaced. For optimum performance, we recommend to replace the filter every 3 months. The Wpro carbon filter with normal hood use should be cleaned once a month. The filter is best washed in the dishwasher at the highest temperature possible, using a normal dishwasher detergent. After washing, dry the filter in the oven at 100°C for 10 minutes to reactivate it. Caution: do not exceed the indicated temperature and drying time in the oven. The filter will retain its odour absorbing capacity for three years. Type 20 Long life (219 x 182 x 20 mm - 160 g)

record.name: PurifAIR
record.shortdescription: PurifAIR
record.longdescription: PurifAIR is an innovative device to keep your refrigerator fresher and more hygienic. Thanks to Microban® exclusive technology, it effectively filters and cleans the air inside your fridge, removing bad odours and protecting against bacteria growth. Thanks to it’s adsorption power the active carbon in the filter reduces on average 70%* of the molecules which are responsible for bad odours. The active carbon is treated with Zinc pyrithione which reduces the amount of bacteria by 60%*. A LED will indicate when your filter needs to be changed (recommended every 6 months). The kit includes: 1 PurifAIR filter holder to be clipped on the fridge shelf, 1 air filter and 1 battery. Suitable for any kind of refrigerators, even static refrigerators.

record.longdescription: The Wpro professional Oven & Grill Cleaner effectively removes burnt-on food and grease deposits. Its powerful formula is ideal to clean the internal parts of ovens, hotplates, barbecues, rotisseries and baking trays whilst leaving a pleasant lemon fragrance. It works on both hot and cold ovens. Dot not use on microwave and catalitic oven, on painted surfaces or aluminium.
record.metaname: Cookers ODS414 Hotpoint United Kingdom
